narrativeArcs.name: The Hero's Quest
narrativeArcs.description: A classic adventure structure with clear phases of development

phases.name: Setting the Scene
phases.description: Establish normal life before the adventure begins
narrativeGoals: Introduce the hero's personality and skills
Show the hero's daily life in their village/home
Hint at what's missing in their life or what they desire

phases.name: The Call to Adventure
phases.description: Something disrupts the hero's normal life
narrativeGoals: Present a clear inciting incident
Introduce a threat, mystery, or opportunity
Establish what's at stake

phases.name: Crossing the Threshold
phases.description: The hero commits to the adventure
narrativeGoals: Hero makes a decisive choice to pursue the adventure
First real challenge or test
Leave familiar surroundings behind

phases.name: Tests, Allies, and Enemies
phases.description: A series of challenges that test the hero and build tension
narrativeGoals: Hero faces increasing challenges
Allies and enemies are encountered
Hero collects items, knowledge, or skills
False victories and setbacks occur

phases.name: Central Ordeal
phases.description: A major test or revelation that changes the hero's understanding
narrativeGoals: Major revelation about the quest or world
Hero faces a seemingly insurmountable challenge
Something thought true is revealed as false
Stakes are raised significantly

phases.name: The Road Back
phases.description: New complications arise after the central ordeal
narrativeGoals: Consequences of earlier choices come into play
New, unexpected challenges arise
Allies may become enemies or vice versa
The true nature of the quest is revealed

phases.name: The Final Ordeal
phases.description: The hero faces their greatest challenge
narrativeGoals: All skills and items acquired are put to use
The main antagonist or challenge is faced directly
Hero must make a significant sacrifice or choice
The central conflict comes to a head

phases.name: Return with the Elixir
phases.description: The hero returns changed from their journey
narrativeGoals: Resolution of the main conflict
Hero changed by their experiences
Rewards are distributed
New status quo is established
Hint at possible future adventures

narrativeArcs.name: The Unfolding Mystery
narrativeArcs.description: A gradually unfolding mystery with multiple twists

phases.name: Strange Discovery
phases.description: The hero encounters something unusual or inexplicable
narrativeGoals: Hero discovers something that doesn't make sense
Initial clue that something is wrong
Establish normal life that will soon be disrupted

phases.name: Initial Investigation
phases.description: Hero begins to investigate the mystery
narrativeGoals: Gathering initial clues
Meeting people connected to the mystery
First dangerous encounter related to investigation

phases.name: First Major Twist
phases.description: The investigation takes an unexpected turn
narrativeGoals: Initial theory is proved wrong
New information changes understanding of the situation
Threat level increases significantly

phases.name: Deeper into the Mystery
phases.description: Hero delves deeper, facing greater challenges
narrativeGoals: More complex clues are discovered
Hero goes to dangerous or forbidden locations
Powers or entities are revealed

phases.name: Second Major Twist
narrativeGoals: Someone trusted is revealed as untrustworthy
The scope of the mystery expands dramatically
A seemingly impossible situation is presented

phases.name: Desperate Measures
phases.description: Hero must take risky actions to solve the mystery
narrativeGoals: Hero takes significant risks
Previously gained knowledge is put to use
Allegiances shift as the truth emerges

phases.name: The Final Revelation
phases.description: The full truth is finally revealed
narrativeGoals: All clues come together to reveal the truth
The actual villain or threat is confronted
Hero must make a final, difficult choice

phases.name: Aftermath
phases.description: Dealing with the consequences of the truth
narrativeGoals: Consequences of the revelation are addressed
Hero changed by what they've learned
New status quo is established
Hints at unsolved mysteries remain
